annotations.title: The 5 Easiest TEQUILA Cocktails

textContent:
2oz Tequila
3oz Grapefruit soda (Squirt)
4 Muddled lime quarters
2 Muddled grapefruit slices
6 Mint leaves

Build in glass
Garnish with mint

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nxBjqBKDYcY

---

1.5oz (45ml) Blanco Tequila
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
.5oz (15ml) Simple Syrup
Top Mexican Squirt
Grapefruit Twist/or Wheel

Shake and pour in collins. Top with squirt. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8DcW1BVlUvc

---

2oz (60ml) of blanco tequila
.75oz (22.5ml) of fresh lime juice 
1oz (30ml) of fresh grapefruit juice
.5oz (15ml) simple syrup
1oz (30ml) chilled club soda 
Lime wedge

Rub lime around rim of a collins glass and dab in salt (optional)
Add tequila, lime juice, grapefruit juice, and simple syrup to a shaker tin
Add ice and shake for 15 seconds
Double strain into collins glass with ice
Top with club soda and stir
Garnish with lime wedge

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aLwBI_i6MQw
title: Paloma
